attributes.action: Only withdraw British troops from Afghanistan when their security forces can handle it; Not before!
attributes.additional_details:
We can't just have our soldiers leave Afghanistan when their security forces aren't ready.

Where are our principles, our morals? If we leave when planned the security forces will not be ready; We'll be leaving the Afghans in the hands of the Taliban.

Soldiers die, and it is sad, but we can't let it be done in vein; They die standing up to tyranny and evil.

So keep the soldiers there for as long as they're needed
